member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether path APIs are available.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether path APIs are available.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether XPath APIs are available.

member.name: M:Namotion.Reflection.Infrastructure.DynamicApis.DirectoryGetCurrentDirectory
member.summary: Gets the current working directory.
member.exception: The System.IO.Directory API is not available on this platform.

member.name: M:Namotion.Reflection.Infrastructure.DynamicApis.FileExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a file exists.
member.exception: The System.IO.File API is not available on this platform.

member.summary: Combines two paths.
member.exception: The System.IO.Path API is not available on this platform.

member.name: M:Namotion.Reflection.Infrastructure.DynamicApis.PathGetDirectoryName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the directory path of a file path.
member.exception: The System.IO.Path API is not available on this platform.

member.summary: Evaluates the XPath for a given XML document.
member.exception: The System.Xml.XPath.Extensions API is not available on this platform.
